## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1e1cb8eec69751930d72ef278244adebda72029c05691d19c2970c1432ac9c1e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@monokera/react-components-storybook' @ 0.0.69 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
